citation: Proclamation under the Taxi and Luxury Hire Car Industries Act 2008 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Taxi and Luxury Hire Car Industries Act 2008

I, the Administrator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Taxi and Luxury Hire Car Industries Act 2008 fix 24 September 2008 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

17 September 2008

E. C. CRAWFORD

Administrator

By His Excellency's Command,

G. L. STURGES

Minister for Infrastructure

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 September 2008

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
